quiz.text: Which of the following has a task to finalize and periodically amend the specifications of the crop residue management under the scheme for Promotion of Agriculture Mechanization for In-Situ Management of Crop Residue?
options: High Powered Committee
Executive Committee
High Level Monitoring Committee
State Level Monitoring Committee
District Level Monitoring Committee

quiz.text: Who among the following is not eligible to get benefits of this scheme?
options: SC/ST entrepreneurs above 18 years of age.
Women entrepreneurs above 18 years of age.
An SC/ST/Women entrepreneur starting his/her 3rd venture.
1 and 3
2 and 3

quiz.text: Under this scheme, composite loans up to ______ of the total project cost (inclusive of term loan and working capital) are provided.
options: 60%
75%
80%
85%
90%

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is incorrect with respect to the above scheme?
options: For non-individual enterprise, min 51% stake should be held by SC/ST/Women entrepreneur.
Loans secured under this scheme are repayable in 7 years.
Maximum moratorium period is 18 months.
Rate of interest not to exceed [base rate (MCLR) + 3% + tenor premium].
This scheme is operated by all Scheduled Commercial Banks / Regional Rural Banks / NBFCs.

quiz.text:
Which of the following are correct with reference to Startup India Seed Fund Scheme?

A. Up to Rs. 25 Lakhs is provided as grant for validation of proof of concept, or prototype development, or product trials.

B. Up to Rs. 50 Lakhs of investment is given for market entry, commercialization, or scaling up through convertible debentures or debt or debt-linked instruments

C. Seed fund shall strictly not be used by startups for creation of any facilities and shall be utilized for the purpose it has been granted for.
options: A and B only
A and C only
B and C only
C only
A, B and C

quiz.text: What is the corpus of the Startup India Seed Fund?
options: 1045 crore
745 crore
845 crore
1145 crore
945 crore

quiz.text: Which of the following is one of the criteria to become an incubator under the Startup India Seed Fund?
options: Incubator must have facilities to seat at least 50 individuals.
Incubator must have at least 15 startups undergoing incubation physically on the date of application.
Incubator should not be disbursing seed fund to incubatees using funding from any third-party private entity.
Incubator should be operational for at least three years on the date of application to the scheme.
Incubator should have been assisted only by State Government earlier to the date of application.
